20.eng-name: Tribute, Spoils, and Rulership (Kitab Al-Kharaj, Wal-Fai' Wal-Imarah)

hadiths.text: ‘Amir Al Sha’bi said “The Prophet (ﷺ) had a special portion in the booty called safi. This would be a slave if he desired or a slave girl if he desired or a horse if he desired. He would choose it before taking out the fifth.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي سَهْمِ الصَّفِيِّ
chapter.eng-name: The Special Portion (As-Safi) Of The Prophet (ﷺ) That Was taken From The Spoils Of War
